channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description:
“Among skeptics was the Florida Democratic congressman Ted Deutch, who has described himself as “a passionate supporter of Israel”. After receiving the dossier, said the source, Deutch told the Israeli delegation its evidence was insufficient. https://t.co/12dc4EBpIN

Going to be interesting how this plays out among American Jewry, particularly with Deutch coming in as head of the AJC.
item.source:markdown:
“Among skeptics was the Florida Democratic congressman Ted Deutch, who has described himself as “a passionate supporter of Israel”. After receiving the dossier, said the source, Deutch told the Israeli delegation its evidence was insufficient. https://t.co/12dc4EBpIN
Going to be interesting how this plays out among American Jewry, particularly with Deutch coming in as head of the AJC.

item.description: @EladNehorai @AbbyChavaStein I’m sure they’ve just been busy teaching what’s happening in Texas. https://t.co/qPdTWQL8xi
item.source:markdown: @EladNehorai @AbbyChavaStein I’m sure they’ve just been busy teaching what’s happening in Texas. https://t.co/qPdTWQL8xi

item.description: @joshtpm I don’t know. “I’ve been to the federal court with a lawyer of no fame” — seems like an America song to me.
item.source:markdown: @joshtpm I don’t know. “I’ve been to the federal court with a lawyer of no fame” — seems like an America song to me.

item.description: Newly uncovered personal letters and short stories written by Joseph Trumpeldor provide a new insight into the fighter who died defending Tel Hai in 1920. https://t.co/1Hw3OcwK4V
item.source:markdown: Newly uncovered personal letters and short stories written by Joseph Trumpeldor provide a new insight into the fighter who died defending Tel Hai in 1920. https://t.co/1Hw3OcwK4V

item.description: @levidmorrow How many led an assembly line that produced followers in an industrial capacity? Heschel had a handful of disciples, but he was detached from the machinery of JTS. The Rav, however…
item.source:markdown: @levidmorrow How many led an assembly line that produced followers in an industrial capacity? Heschel had a handful of disciples, but he was detached from the machinery of JTS. The Rav, however…

item.description: @levidmorrow Doesn’t that passage you originally quoted concerning Weimar buy into the Nazi framing of the situation?
item.source:markdown: @levidmorrow Doesn’t that passage you originally quoted concerning Weimar buy into the Nazi framing of the situation?

item.description: @levidmorrow I wonder if this is true of other great Jewish theologians of the 19th and 20th centuries.
item.source:markdown: @levidmorrow I wonder if this is true of other great Jewish theologians of the 19th and 20th centuries.

item.description:
@levidmorrow A charitable reading would be that he was so stunned by the multiple levels of powerlessness inherent in being an American Orthodox rabbi in the post-war era that he never grappled with power.

@levidmorrow In that, a deep contrast with Yitz Greenberg.

@levidmorrow The reality is that Rabbi Soloveitchik’s students managed to abuse power in a variety of sins of omission and commission.

@levidmorrow But the fact remains: One top talmid used his rabbinic authority and charisma to rape teens, and an even more revered talmid helped the rapist obstruct justice.

@levidmorrow I wonder if this is true of any other of the great 19th and 20th century Jewish theologians.

Possible cover art for Artifacts of Orthodox Jewish Childhoods Vol II? https://t.co/f1PKKclDvR

Art courtesy of https://t.co/vC3I7drMDL. @DainyBernstein, what do you think?
item.source:markdown:
Possible cover art for Artifacts of Orthodox Jewish Childhoods Vol II? https://t.co/f1PKKclDvR
Art courtesy of https://t.co/vC3I7drMDL. @DainyBernstein, what do you think?

item.description:
@rmneiss https://t.co/etDXLvOjYv

@rmneiss Anyway, it’s only certain anti-Zionist Jews who are persona non grata. This worksheet teaching first graders to hate Zionists won’t arouse as much hatred as a Congressman taking a J Street position. https://t.co/ei1127PZqC

item.description:
@rabbitworship @EvanCull @LeiQiaosi @MairavZ This seems to be the best report of the Israeli argument, which boils down to hearsay from people not in a position to know. https://t.co/4UkN6GUncv

@rabbitworship @EvanCull @LeiQiaosi @MairavZ And a further argument that relies on guilt by association, rather than, say, forensic accounting. https://t.co/vAPlpBTbyG
